meanings.definition: A person who has assets or wealth totaling one billion dollars or more.
meanings.sent1: The world's richest billionaire built a massive mansion.
meanings.sent2: The billionaires invested in new technology companies.
meanings.sent3: The group of billionaires decided to buy a private island for fun.
meanings.sent4: In the land of billionaires, money grows on trees.
meanings.sent5: The billionaire's yacht was so luxurious, it had its own helicopter pad.

meanings.sent1: Many billionaires attended the charity event.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with billionaires from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The billionaires' convention had a contest for the best dressed.
meanings.sent4: The street was lined with limousines, a sign of the billionaires' arrival.
meanings.sent5: The billionaires' club had strict membership requirements.
